term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - height equivalent to a theoretical plate (h.e.t.p.), in chromatography
term.title: height equivalent to a theoretical plate (h.e.t.p.)

item.text: The column length divided by the theoretical plate number.

term.citation: Citation: 'height equivalent to a theoretical plate (h.e.t.p.)' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.H02761

term.collection: If you are interested in licensing the Gold Book for commercial use, please contact the IUPAC Executive Director at executivedirector@iupac.org .
term.disclaimer: The International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry (IUPAC) is continuously reviewing and, where needed, updating terms in the Compendium of Chemical Terminology (the IUPAC Gold Book). Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
